mewara palath sabha mathiwaranaya itha sadharana saha awanka lesa pawathwimata rajaya katayuthu kirima nisa uthuru palathe demala janathawa kisindu balapamakin thorawa siya chandaya pawichchi kala bawa eepidipi nayaka daglas dewananda mahatha pawasayi.rajaya prajathanthrawadayata garu karana bawatath janathawa prajathanthrawadaya bhukthi windina bawatath eya hondama nidasunak yayi da amathiwaraya kiya.uthuru palath sabha mathiwaranaye di demala katha karana janathawagen laba gath warama piligena demala jathika sandhanaya demala katha karana janathawage porondu itu kala yuthu yayi da eya sidu wuwa hoth ema janathawage sthirasara sathuta wenuwen thaman da eya piliganimata pasubata nowana bawa da prakasha karayi.
